mdRecord.dcterms:description: There are two versions of this black and white photograph showing the Walker & Wood Bros. store with three men standing on the porch. On the back of the original photograph there is a handwritten note: "Clarence, Jo and H. L. Walker." On the back of the copy there are handwritten notes: "Alex's Presentation, 11/23/99" is written in one hand; "Left -- Clarence M. Wood, Joseph M. Wood, Brothers" and "Right, Harry L. Walker" written in another hand.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Walker & Wood Bros. Store (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans
Small business
Virginia -- Lexington
Twentieth century
